doc.title: Lady Bountiful Visits the Murphys on Wash Day
doc.plot: This is a splendid comedy scene. Lady Bountiful, stylishly dressed, is standing in front of the wash tub talking to Mrs. Murphy. The small boy places the end of Lady Bountiful's train in the wringer and then grinds hard, forcing Lady Bountiful to sit down in the suds, from which predicament she is rescued with difficulty.
